name: Apradar
body:
This is a fork from https://github.com/bhmahler/ApRadar

I'm a old player, i do not play at this time but will most likely come back.
So since bhmahler is busy with life, i will try and keep apradar working.

I wont be adding any new features, i will try and keep it working pass updates.
Bug fix's might be slow as i have work and life also, But i will try and prioritize major bugs to my available time.

Need to install:
Microsoft SQL Server Compact 3.5 Service Pack 1
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=5821

Microsoft SQL Server Compact 4.0
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17876
